mapper.sql: ID,CONFIG_ID, INSURANCE_ID, CONFIG_TYPE, CONFIG_SERVICE, INTERFACE_URL, TRANS_TYPE, ASYN, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE
mapper.insert: insert into T_INSURANCE_INTERFACE_CONFIG (CONFIG_ID, INSURANCE_ID, CONFIG_TYPE, CONFIG_SERVICE, INTERFACE_URL, TRANS_TYPE, ASYN, ISVALID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{configId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{insuranceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{configType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{configService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{interfaceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{asyn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isvalid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update T_INSURANCE_INTERFACE_CONFIG set INSURANCE_ID = #{insuranceId,jdbcType=CHAR}, CONFIG_TYPE = #{configType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONFIG_SERVICE = #{configService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERFACE_URL = #{interfaceUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANS_TYPE = #{transType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ASYN = #{asyn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CONFIG_ID = #{configId,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select from T_INSURANCE_INTERFACE_CONFIG where CONFIG_ID = #{configId,jdbcType=CHAR} AND ISVALID = '1'
